name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 6, Kaifeng, Henan. Huida Zichen real estate project was left unfinished, and the owner was taken away by the police for rights protection.
November 6, Yishui, Shandong. Shandong Smart Highway Project Company claimed that buying oil cards could make money, but it was unable to repay the money later. Investors defended their rights outside the Yishui County Government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 5, the Social Work Department of Shahe City, Hebei Province announced that it would develop more than 500 food delivery couriers into community volunteer inspectors. Representatives of Meituan Food Delivery and the city property company signed a cooperation agreement, and the Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Committee of Shahe City and the Minister of the Social Work Department presided over the signing ceremony.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 3, herders in Keshiketeng Banner, Chifeng City, Inner Mongolia reported that state subsidies for farmers and herdsmen had not been paid for two years. The herders went to the banner government to ask for it, but no one from the government came forward to respond.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump has currently won 178 electoral votes.
Harris has currently won 99 electoral votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/4xTde7ihTY

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Trump won Iowa and Kansas, and his electoral votes exceeded 200, now he has 210 electoral votes. Harris currently has 113 electoral votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Harris wins California. The state has 54 electoral votes

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Trump won North Carolina. He is also leading in five other swing states

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Trump 230 to Harris 205. Trump previously said that if he won Pennsylvania, he would win everything.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 2:00 pm Beijing time, with the closing of the last polling station in Alaska, all voting on the US election day ended. Trump has currently received 247 electoral votes, while Harris has received 210 votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump is expected to speak at the Palm Beach Convention Center in Florida.
Harris will not speak for now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Fox News data, Trump has won 277 electoral votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Trump announced his victory in the 2024 presidential election in the early hours of the 6th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 5, CCTV released a video saying that the US election is a game of burning money. This triggered ridicule from netizens.
Netizens responded, "North Korea doesn't need to spend money, its father has already designated it"
"You actually laugh at others, but you don't even know where your own family's money has gone"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 5, a user launched a poll on Weibo: Who do you think will be elected president of the United States?
The poll was deleted by Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 6 (Released) It was reported online that a user asked the domestic AI "Tongyi AI" to generate a photo of "carrying wheat for 200 miles on a mountain road", and as a result, the account was banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is reported that the Chifeng Banner Agriculture and Animal Husbandry Bureau replied in March 2024 that the 2023 grassland ecological protection subsidy reward funds for Keshiketeng Banner have not been issued yet.
This year, agricultural machinery subsidies and forestry, agriculture and animal husbandry subsidies have been delayed in many places in Inner Mongolia.
Some government department staff admitted that the subsidies were not issued due to tight financial funds.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A Chinese barbecue restaurant was asked by the State Intellectual Property Office to change its name in order to avoid the name of Kim Jong-un.
November 6 (Release) The well-known online barbecue restaurant "An San Pang" announced that the original brand name Min Yi had a negative impact on the public, and after repeated reminders from the State Intellectual Property Office, it was renamed "An You Pang"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 5, Kunming, Yunnan. A slogan "Japan and China have national hatred and family feuds" was posted on the rear windshield of a van.
And the side glass was posted with a slogan "The van is a tool for life. How can the government treat me humanely? I am an elderly widow, living in debt, sick, and have no money to treat. Can it withstand investigation?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 5, Shandong. A woman posted that she bought a second-hand iPad and called 12315 to complain.
Later, 12315 called back, but the woman didn't answer the call because she was sleeping. When she woke up and opened the voicemail, she heard the staff scolding her "dog"
The local market supervision and management bureau: We will investigate and deal with it seriously.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 5, CCTV News released a video on Kuaishou titled "Xi Jinping meets with representatives of airborne soldiers."
Incredibly, most users in the comment section have no works on their homepages, and the IP on their homepages also shows: unknown

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Hong Kong's famous director Johnnie To criticized Hong Kong for losing human rights and freedom. Hong Kong media Ta Kung Pao refuted that he could say that Hong Kong has no freedom, which just proves that Hong Kong has freedom of speech.
Then a Weibo celebrity reposted Johnnie To's remarks, and as a result, 3 of the 4 pictures were blocked by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 6, Xi Jinping emphasized during his inspection in Hubei that we must vigorously promote the spirit of fighting the epidemic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 5, the official response stated that there was no fine and the driver was stopped by the traffic police because he entered a restricted area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 6, Japanese media reported that a 44-year-old Chinese man named Xiao Fuyong was arrested by the police. In August this year, he told the clerk in a famous brand store in Shibuya, "I want to buy this watch" and then gave the clerk 1.3 million yen. When the clerk turned his back to count the money, he immediately put the Rolex watch worth 4.37 million yen into his bag. The clerk then turned around and said that the money was not enough, and Xiao Fuyong took the money and left, using the excuse of going out to change money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 6, on the streets of Wuhan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 5, a man was driven away by security guards while setting up a tent to rest under a bridge. The man said to the security guards, "Is this the Communist Party's world?" "We are all in the same class and at the bottom. Why do you bully me?" "I see you are 60 years old. Have you read Mao Zedong's quotations? You should be angry with the capitalists."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 5, Shanghai. A questionnaire about students from Longming Middle School, which investigated the students’ family background and class, was circulated online, sparking heated discussions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 5, according to "Gronghui" data: In the first three quarters of 2024, China's residents' net property income was 2,585 yuan, the lowest in nearly ten years since statistics were available in 2014.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 5, Shanghai. A cyclist was stopped by a traffic policeman and kept kneeling and kowtowed to the traffic policeman. "I am just working, I beg you, please show mercy, I can't survive at the bottom any more."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 5, Fujian. A blogger posted a clip from the movie "My Life" in which an old man denounced the old society, which triggered a collective attack on the forum by netizens, who expressed their dissatisfaction with the authorities in the comment section.
Netizens replied, "Isn't this the idol you chose yourself?"
"Fuck them! You can only fight for happiness yourself"
"It's time to rebel"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 4, Heilongjiang. Blogger "Gao Chuanyuan" exposed the tricks of Gaza Internet celebrities to fake and gain sympathy.
The girl in the video was hit by a car on the first day and could not walk, and her legs were wrapped in gauze. As a result, the girl took off the gauze on the second day, and walked briskly, with her legs as smooth as new. The blogger said: Is this the reincarnation of Hua Tuo, or the Gaza Wolverine.
